com.facebook.buck.util

Class AnsiEnvironmentChecking

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.util.AnsiEnvironmentChecking

  • public class AnsiEnvironmentChecking
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to check if the environment supports ANSI escape sequences.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean environmentSupportsAnsiEscapes(Platform platform, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> environment)
      Returns true if the environment supports ANSI escape sequences, false otherwise.
